title: IronMind Wrist Defender - Self-Defense: Prevents/Relieves Carpal Tunnel Syndrome, Arthritis, Repetitive Stress Injuries, Cramping
features: Targets the wrist area, for gentle stretching, strengthening and range-of-motion movements
Doubles as a self defense tool - train and protect yourself while walking
Relieve discomfort from carpal tunnel, arthritis, repetitive stress injuries, and cramping in wrists
User-friendly, and ready to use at work, home or while you walk your dog
Ergonomic shape and wrist strap that also makes it easy to hold on to. 6" x 2" and weighs approximately 1-1/4 lb.
Made in the USA by IronMind, the industry leader since 1988
description: Defend yourself! Are you suffering from carpal tunnel syndrome, arthritis, repetitive stress injuries and cramping? Wrists locked in an uncomfortable position or flopping around like a rag doll? Here's a way to get some relief for those painful wrists, or, better yet, prevent them from occurring. IronMind's Wrist Defender can work wonders by promoting blood flow, gently relieving pressure in the wrist area, encouraging increased range of motion and added flexibility. A couple of quick minutes with this friendly tool, gently loosening and stretching your joints, can make your fingers and wrists dance instead of drag. It's soft, so it's easy on your body (as well as your desk), with an ergonomic shape and wrist strap that also makes it easy to hold on to. 6" x 2" and weighs approximately 1-1/4 lb.; contains no sand or lead.
